page.title: 07Religion in Horwich
page.content:
There are three places of worship within the area. The first of these is the Roman Catholic Chapel of Ease, In honour of{St. Anthony.}This is situated next to St. Joseph's Secondary School on Chorley New Road. Both the chapel and the school belong to the parish of St. Mary.
There is a second chapel which is called St. Elizabeths. This is the {Methodist church}and is situated directly opposite the afore mentioned school.
The third religious meeting house is a{Non Conformist chapel.}The majority of the people in the area attend church ocassionally with the remainder equally divided between those who attend on a regular basis and those who do not attend at all.
